column1: '''''Exeter College Smoker''''' is a programme for a college concert, featuring  a cover illustration by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
The illustration has been reprinted in ''[[The Tolkien Family Album]]'' (1992), ''[[Tolkien: Life and Legend]]'' (1992),<ref>{{webcite
column7: accessed=13 February 2012}}</ref> and ''[[Tolkien at Exeter College]]'' (2014).
